document_data.name: Veshal
document_data.mainbody: '''Veshal''' was a [[dragonsoul]] of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] that operated on the isle of [[Tuern]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: He wielded a massive spear in battle.
document_data.Relationships: Veshal rode atop an enormous red [[drake]].
document_data.History: Some time during the 1480s [[DR]],{{ToD-time}} Veshal was stationed at the entrance to inner reaches of the [[Lair of Lostmauth|personal lair]] of Tuern's [[red dragon]] tyrant [[Lostmauth]]. He remained there the same time that the Dragon Cult's leader [[Severin Silrajin]] ventured within to parlay with Lostmauth for the destruction of the city of [[Neverwinter]].
